pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
